name: Millie
description: A joyful, casual puzzle game that will tease both your wits and your memory!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 Процессор: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz Видеокарта: nVidia GeForce 7800, ATI/AMD Radeaon HD2600/3600

reviews.review_text: Addictive little game. Like the classic 'snake', you eat dots that makes you grow and must not eat your tail or body, in puzzle levels that require a little bit of thinking to make it through without leaving a dot being and thus getting full score. There are a few constrains making it original, like one-way paths and ice patches on which you can't change direction, forcing more thinking.  Also, I encounter an issue and the developpers correct it within 2 days, which is really great!
The Real life of a worm! lol
It's a great game for relaxation and re-tuning your positivity!! :)
It's very cute and challenging! Makes me want to throw my computer, but it's so addicting!

Something about this reminded me of Snake from 'way back when'. Kind of an interesting idea, but it left me a little wanting. It obviously gives the appearance of being for children, though I doubt many could solve all the maps. Millie, couldn't grab me for long enough to play through the whole thing. That said, its worth a try, I imagine many people who started playing in the early 90s would find something nostalgic about this little game, and for the price, its worth taking that chance.
only been thru the rist stage but i have to say it is neat and a lot like snake from the old days, as in the basic movement etc....i would say try it out if you like that type of play/style.
PACMAN? NO! Its Paclie,Just Like Pacman without enemy

Millie is an indie, casual, Snake-like game featuring a millipede named Millie (I'm sure the pun was intended) who wants to learn to fly an airplaine. However, unlike Snake, there are various barriers placed around the map, which gives the game a bit more of a challenge. Overall, I enjoy the gameplay and this twist. The art is also really cute, which is a plus for me. The only annoyance that I have is the loud tune that is played when you eat x orbs (100, 200, 300) but I got over it after a while. ^^

This game is not only aborable but actually suprisingly good gameplay. It is an amazing combination of pacman and snake. It has full controller support so you can play it casualy as a controller game to. I rreally reccomend the game if you need a small game to play. It's a really nice game.
